    Hell Beast looked to the fimiliar fuzor standing before him. Why he was 
pointing a wepon at his new Commander was a bit strange.....he would be 
punished. The first of many punishments administered by Hell Beast to awaken 
a lax crew.
    "I suggest you point that gun else where, Quickstrike, or you will find 
yourself regretting ev--well, if it isnt my favorite little arachnid, Black 
Aracnia. Last time I saw you, you were trying to kill me." Hell Beast said to 
Quickstrike, just as Aracnia approached.
    "Hell Beast, your welcome to enter MY ship, but dont expect any special 
treatment. Your not some god, your just a-" She said, but was silenced when 
Hell Beast slapped her in the face and walked over her fallen body into the 
ship.
    "Lets get one thing straight....im in Command here." Hell Beast chuckled 
looking at Quickstrike.

    Megatron turned to Terrorsaur, "Sub-Commander, we are cloneing Inferno to 
take over the beast wars. With his blind loyalty, he will be the perfect 
soldier."
